Title: The Jungle Book 2
Writer: Karl Geurs (screenplay by), Carter Crocker (additional written material), Evan Spiliotopoulos (additional written material), David Reynolds (additional written material), Roger S.H. Schulman (additional written material), Tom Rogers (additional written material)
Actors: John Goodman, Haley Joel Osment, Mae Whitman, Connor Funk
Plot: Jungle boy Mowgli (voiced by Osment) decides to forsake civilized village life for the "bare necessities" of the wild with his old friends. However, the evil tiger Shere Khan is looking for a little payback after Mowgli's last adventure. Trouble's a-brewing!
